Reviews.Title: Can't pick up video 15' away
Reviews.Author: t7
Reviews.Content: Wow, this camera has to be within 15 ft. of the receiver, it won't go through a normal interior house wall at all.  Even when beside the receiver the video goes out.  I took this back to the store, this is worse quality even than a kids toy, I wouldn't even give it that.

ProductInfo.Features:
"FIRST ALERT" WIRELESS ANALOG CAMERA
LED night vision technology to view up to 16' with 11 infrared LEDs
Transmission up to 330'
All weather for placement indoors and outdoors
Built in audio surveillance to hear disturbances up to 10'
ProductInfo.Name: First Alert Wireless Analog Camera
